TYVM for the update.

Any chance you could find the latest Tycoon gold addon? Much appreciated.
go this way to be updated on tycoon stuff http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7875033

If you're on a Mac, don't download this shit, or any uploads from kissmark. I have tried all of them, and at least on a Mac, not a single one of them work. You won't be able to load up a single guide in-game. Just a warning before you waste your time.
THIS DOES NOT WORK DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH IT

Works fine on pc, thanks. Those that can't get it to work, ****once again***, you need to put the folder ***inside*** the extracted folder in your interface wow folder. If you just extract it and place that folder in you wow game it won't work. If this all confuses you, you shouldn't be downloading free stuff off piratebay.
This Torrent does not work with panda class i havnt tried it on my other toons yet but as far as i can tell this torrent is crap it does not work

I've used Kissmark's zygors torrent and am using it right now flawlessly, if you can't figure out how to put the mods correctly into your Mods folder then thats your own fault, Bother to check that their may be two folders or even 3 ? You gotta unzip it.. Then look at the folder and find the Main folder that when you double click on it shows all the mods, Thats the folder you put in your interface folder, Don't say something doesn't work because you can't do it correctly.
so this doesnt work on mac or the people that r saying just doesnt no how to setup it up? THNAKS :)
Good download however it is missing ZygorLevelingPandaStarterMOP.lua which is the guide for players starting a new pandaren character.
